review: Works great and 100 times better than my Sony blu Ray wifi box. Voice activated app is awesome and it's so easy to use and so small I can carry it anywhere

review: Love, love, love the fire stick! I have thoroughly enjoyed watching videos and listening to music! We bought a second one for our bedroom. :)

review: Worked perfectly right out of the box! Simple easy-to-use instructions! And very cost-effective. So quick and easy to use, it has become the go to device for our entertainment!
